title.rendered: US President Trump signs funding bill to reopen the federal government

caption.rendered: El presidente de EEUU, Donald Trump, firma el paquete de financiación firmado para la reapertura del Gobierno federal desde el Despacho Oval de la Casa Blanca en Washington. Foto EFE

image_meta.caption: WASHINGTON (United States), 13/11/2025.- US President Donald Trump (C) signs the funding package to re-open the federal government in the Oval Office of the White House in Washington, DC, USA, 12 November 2025. The short-term spending bill fund the government through 30 January and end the longest shutdown in US history. EFE/EPA/BONNIE CASH / POOL
image_meta.title: US President Trump signs funding bill to reopen the federal government
